thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by chrissie gallagher

author: chrissie gallagher
title: chrissie gallagher
text:
This phone has been a great investment for my dad. He is in an aged care facility and the option of having a phone in his room was going to be very expensive with no discounts for his calls -- including overseas and national calls.
I purchased this phone in order to keep him in touch with friends and family and to limit who he could call... he was constantly calling people and bothering them.... as dementia does to people.
Ok so now he is mostly happy (I am amazed at the simplicity of the phone) with his phone. No one calls me he says well he leaves it in his room so not much can be made of this problem.
Back up on the phone has been fabulous and prompt.
We did try many phones, trying to adapt them to his needs etc but none were as satisfactory or complete in this process.
thank you Dennis and your company.
chrissie
